thread.title: PrescribeWellness Appoints Eugene O’Donnell, J.D., as Director of Industry Relations

author: cnbc.com
title: PrescribeWellness Appoints Eugene O’Donnell, J.D., as Director of Industry Relations
text:
IRVINE, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- PrescribeWellness , the cloud-based services company whose mission is to inspire collaboration for better health, today announced the addition of Eugene O’Donnell to its team as Director of Industry Relations.
“We are excited to welcome Eugene to the team,” said Al Babbington, co-founder and CEO of PrescribeWellness. “Eugene brings with him years of pharmacy experience and relationships. He will be an asset in helping us to bring our technology solutions to community pharmacies across the nation—solutions that help them go ‘beyond the fill’ every day to provide important clinical and preventive care services to their communities—and get paid for them.”
O’Donnell comes to PrescribeWellness from Mirixa, where he most recently led business development and formerly led development of tech-driven solutions that enabled pharmacists to provide clinical care activities, such as a Medicare plan finder tool and a chronic disease management and educational tool. O’Donnell also served as CEO of the South Carolina Pharmacy Association and as the Executive Director of the Mississippi Pharmacy Association, where he did important work advocating for pharmacists and patient care.
“The PrescribeWellness team is exceptional, and it is an honor to be a part of a solution so directly empowering pharmacists to deliver clinical services and assume a greater role in patient care,” said O’Donnell.
O’Donnell earned a Bachelor of Arts in Political Science from the University of Alabama in 2002 and a Juris Doctorate from Mississippi College School of Law in 2006. O’Donnell is a member of the Mississippi Bar Association and the National Alliance of State Pharmacy Associations (NASPA).
About PrescribeWellness
PrescribeWellness inspires collaboration for better health across America by connecting patients to locally owned community pharmacies. Its proprietary cloud-based platform empowers pharmacists to provide more effective preventive healthcare services, which improve medication adherence, chronic disease management, transitions in care, and population health. With data integration and behavioral science at the foundation, PrescribeWellness software solutions position the pharmacist at the center of community healthcare prevention. Inc. 5000 named PrescribeWellness one of America’s Fastest Growing Privately-Held Companies for the past two years. For more information, please visit www.prescribewellness.com .
